entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:24 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -24.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 04:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -24.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -27.8°C
Wind: SE 56 km/h gust 69 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 22 with temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this afternoon then sunny. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 this afternoon. High minus 22 with temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
